section.title: Issue tracking
section.para: The development of DataCleaner is driven primarily by issues registered in our issue tracking system, trac . In trac every member of the community has the possibility to register, monitor and update issues ('tickets') that he/she prioritizes.
When submitting code in Subversion, it is recommended to prefix the commit remarks with the ticket id, so that we can track issues and their corresponding patches.

section.title: Building DataCleaner
section.para: Check out the source code for AnalyzerBeans and DataCleaner from subversion:
section.programlisting: > svn checkout http://eobjects.org/svn/AnalyzerBeans/trunk/ AnalyzerBeans > svn checkout http://eobjects.org/svn/DataCleaner/trunk/ DataCleaner
> cd AnalyzerBeans > mvn clean install > cd ../DataCleaner > mvn clean install
